Ingredients.1: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into strips

Ingredients.8: 2  red bell peppers, cut into 1/4-inch strips

Directions.1: Combine chicken strips and fajita marinade in a large bowl. Let marinate in the refrigerator, 1 hour to overnight.

Directions.2: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.

Directions.3: Combine oil, minced garlic, salt, and pepper together in a bowl. Clean heads of romaine lettuce; cut in half from end to end. Brush halved romaine lettuce with oil-garlic mixture.

Directions.4: Add sliced peppers and onions to the oil-garlic mixture. Toss to combine.

Directions.5: Arrange the romaine cut-side down on the oiled grill. Cook just until grill marks appear, about 2 minutes. Remove and set aside to cool.

Directions.6: If you have a grill basket, spread marinated chicken evenly in the basket; otherwise, thread chicken and vegetables on skewers. Grill chicken for 5 minutes. Turn the chicken in the basket, add the vegetables, and grill until an instant-read thermometer inserted in the chicken reaches 165 degrees F (74 degrees C), about 10 minutes more.

Directions.7: Slice grilled lettuce and place on serving plates. Divide chicken and vegetables evenly over the grilled romaine lettuce.
